mapper.select: select cno, bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date from comment where cno=#{cno}
mapper.update: update comment set comment=#{comment}, up_date=now() where cno=#{cno} and commenter=#{commenter}
mapper.insert: insert into comment (bno,pcno,comment,commenter, reg_date, up_date) values (#{bno},#{pcno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now(), now());
mapper.delete: delete from comment where cno=#{cno} and commenter=#{commenter}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where bno=#{bno}
